entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
